short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trackingplan helps you debug your analytics live in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension for debugging analytics implementation on your website.

When used together with Trackingplan SDK, this extension can automatically find problems in your analytics, marketing, attribution pixels, and campaign implementation.

This extension can debug most analytics providers such as Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, Universal Analytics, Amplitude, Segment among others.

* Server side hits are supported.

Do the following with Trackingplan extension:

- See everything you track and export your tracking plan.
- Automatically document your analytics implementation.
- Get alerts when any event or property is not getting enough hits.
- Create your analytics schema automatically.
- Prevent schema conflicts.
- Detect pixel and tag misconfigurations.
- Prevent UTM naming mistakes.
- Find rogue and duplicate events.
- Reduce data downtime.
- Much more.
